thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Graduation

title: Graduation
text:
Silvio1953 (128718) 2015-07-12 10:06 
Ciao Ricardo, lovely composition with beautiful graphic, how many soldiers, fine details and excellent clarity, veru well done, my friend, ciao Silvio (51733) 2015-07-12 10:18 
Hello, They look like gold! :P A lot of people that should secure the life in your country. Hope they will do so! Great artistic shot! Daniel (7451) 2015-07-12 11:21 
Hello Ricardo, This scene is very eye-catching. Having so many people in the frame, and all of the them facing the same direction, has a strong visual impact. It seems like the men and women have slightly different hats. I like the band of light illuminating the middle of the photo, too.
